mapper.select: SELECT ADMIN_CODE FROM ADMININFO WHERE ADMIN_ID = #{adminId} AND ADMIN_PW = CRYPTPACK.ENCRYPT(#{adminPw}, #{adminPw})

SELECT ROWNUM, SL.SCHOOL_NAME, SU.SIGUNGU_NAME, CCTV_COUNT, CAR_SERVICE_FLAG , CP.BUSINESS_LICENSE, SIGNUP_DATE, CK.SIGNUP_OK_DATE FROM SCHOOL SL, CHIEFSIGNUP CP, CSIGNUPCHECK CK, SIGUNGU SU WHERE SL.SCHOOL_CODE = CP.SCHOOL_CODE AND CP.C_SIGNUP_CODE = CK.C_SIGNUP_CODE AND SL.SIGUNGU_NUM = SU.SIGUNGU_NUM

SELECT ROWNUM, UO.USER_ID, UO.USER_NAME, UO.USER_TEL, SL.SCHOOL_NAME, UO.USER_BIRTH , SL.SCHOOL_TEL, CP.BUSINESS_LICENSE, CP.SIGNUP_DATE, SU.SIGUNGU_NAME FROM SCHOOL SL, CHIEFSIGNUP CP, USERCODE UE, USERINFO UO, SIGUNGU SU WHERE SL.SCHOOL_CODE = CP.SCHOOL_CODE AND UE.USER_CODE = CP.USER_CODE AND UE.USER_CODE = UO.USER_CODE AND SU.SIGUNGU_NUM = SL.SIGUNGU_NUM
